message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. I'm willing to give you 10% of the money. I think this is a good start.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the inflation we have to deal with.  Let's get this done quickly.

Bob, I understand the inflation is hurting us both. I'm willing to compromise further, but I believe this split is fairer considering my gains are also affected by inflation. Let's end this game and get the money.
